sentences: Töö tuleb õigel ajal ära teha ja toime tulla.
Me peame selle probleemi koos toime tullima.
context: The Estonian word 'toime' is primarily used in the reflexive verb construction 'toime tulla', which means to be able to handle something, cope with it, or manage a situation. It refers to successfully dealing with challenges, responsibilities, or tasks. The word can also appear as part of other compound expressions related to capability and ability.
